Text:
Hopefully, one of these days you will smarten up to the point where you start creating individual torrents for each disc, instead of making enormous torrents that no one is ever going to help you seed.

Keep the following in mind:

1. The smaller the block size used when creating the torrent, the better the data will replicate between peers.

2. The smaller the size of the torrent, the more people will help you seed it.
